import React from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const BlogDetails = ({post}) => { return (
{post.title}

By {post.author} on {" "} {post.category}

Posted on {post.date}

{post.content}

{post.tags.map( (tag, index) => ( {`#${tag}`} ) )}
) } export default BlogDetails
